content: AG 6D-22 Cordless angle grinder (6) Powerful cordless angle grinder with brushless motor, SensTech control and advanced safety features for discs up to 6 (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features Very slim but powerful cordless 6 angle grinder engineered for your toughest cutting, finishing and grinding tasks More cuts per charge – get more done with one battery thanks to the combination of brushless motor and longer-lasting Nuron batteries Ultimate power-to-weight ratio – double the cutting speed but the same weight as previous Hilti cordless grinders Innovative ergonomics – slimmer grip with touch-activated SensTech dead-man’s function instead of a mechanical paddle, for better comfort and maneuverability Upgraded safety features – new 3D Active Torque Control (ATC) for better protection against angle grinder kickback in any direction Applications Cutting rebar, pipes and sheet metal Weld removal, notching, grinding, deburring and finishing metal surfaces Cutting and grinding concrete, masonry, roof tiles or stone ### TECHNICAL DATA: Rated voltage: 21.6 V Disc diameter: 6 in Tool body weight: 4.4 lb. Technical Data | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Disc diameter | 5.9 in | Tool body weight | 4.4 lb | Max. cutting depth | 1.81 in | No load RPM | gear 6: 8500 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 11.8 x 3.3 x 5.2 in | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 4.4 lb ### ITEMS- 2215473 - Cordl. angle grinder AG 6D-22-6 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x AG 6D-22-6 Cordl. angle grinder - 1x Wrench - 1x Outer Flange - 1x 5/8 D45 Flange inside - 1x Threaded stud - 1x Comfort side handle - 1x 150 Protective cover assy - 1x 150 Clip-on front cover
